Please address your reply to the attention of Permissions Department, 457 Madison Avenue.
April 28, 1964
Dear Mr. Fellows:
I have brought your letter of April 8th to the attention of management.
As we wish to cooperate fully with the efforts of Voice of
America and N.E.A.B. we will in this instance waive our charge for
use of Wallace Stevens* "Disillusionment at Ten 0*Clock."
James A. Fellows,Esq.
Assistant Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 36, D.C.
